spell_list.description: Whenever the raid strikes a death blow, the caster's group will gain increased AE Auto Attack and Attack Speed. This also has a very small chance to increment when attacking. This increments up to 25 times. It is dispelled when any group member dies. Does not persist through zoning.
spell_list.description_pvp: Whenever the raid strikes a death blow, the caster's group will gain increased AE Auto Attack and Attack Speed. This also has a very small chance to increment when attacking. This increments up to 25 times. It is dispelled when any group member dies. Does not persist through zoning.

effect_list.description: On any combat or spell hit this spell may cast Blazing Energy on target.  Lasts for 15 minutes.  Triggers about 0.2 times per minute.
Group members (AE) has a 1.0% chance of having one of their weapons' auto-attack affect multiple targets they are facing, who are within range of that weapon.
Dispelled when a group member dies.
Increases Attack Speed of group members (AE) by 1.0

spell_list.name: Blazing Energy
